name: spring arrival
lyric:
All the birds have come again

Hear the happy chorus

Robin bluebird on the wing

Thrush and wren this message bring

Spring will soon come marching in

Come with joyous singing

All the birds have come again

Hear the happy chorus

Robin bluebird on the wing

Thrush and wren this message bring

Spring will soon come marching in

Come with joyous singing
